# üî™ Avenger Harmful

Host can set whether the Impostor can become an Avenger. When the Avenger is killed (voted out and unconventional kills are not counted), the Avenger will revenge a random player.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Avengers that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Avenger
  • An Impostor can become an Avenger
    • ON: Impostors can become this role
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become this role

From: TOHY & Coding: NCSIMONopen in new window„ÄÅKARPED1EMopen in new window
